17 void print_grid (nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid& grid)
18 {
19  for (int i=grid.info.height-1; i>=0; --i) {
20  for (int j=0; j<grid.info.width; ++j) {
21  int8_t cell = grid.data[i*grid.info.width + j];
22  if (cell == 0) {
23  if (i == grid.info.height - 1) {
24  if (j == grid.info.width - 1)
25  cerr << "‾⌉";
26  else if (j == 0)
27  cerr << "⌈‾";
28  else
29  cerr << "‾‾";
30  }
31  else if (i == 0) {
32  if (j == grid.info.width - 1)
33  cerr << "_⌋";
34  else if (j == 0)
35  cerr << "⌊_";
36  else
37  cerr << "__";
38  }
39  else if (j == 0)
40  cerr << "⎢ ";
41  else if (j == grid.info.width - 1)
42  cerr << " ⎥";
43  else
44  cerr << " ";
45  }
46  else if (cell == 100)
47  cerr << "██";
48  else
49  cerr << " ";
50  }
51  cerr << endl;
52  }
53 }

58 TEST (NodeTestMissionArea, testGetArea)
59 {
60  // create service client
61  NodeHandle nh;
62  ServiceClient client = nh.serviceClient<cpswarm_msgs::GetPoints>("area/get_area");
63  ASSERT_TRUE(client.waitForExistence(Duration(5.0))); // failure, if server does not respond within 5 seconds
64  cpswarm_msgs::GetPoints msg;
65 
66  // test response
67  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
68  ASSERT_EQ(msg.response.points.size(), 4);
69  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.points[0].x, -6, 0.01);
70  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.points[0].y, -6, 0.01);
71  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.points[0].z, 0, 0.01);
72  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.points[1].x, -6, 0.01);
73  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.points[1].y, 6, 0.01);
74  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.points[1].z, 0, 0.01);
75  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.points[2].x, 6, 0.01);
76  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.points[2].y, -4, 0.01);
77  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.points[2].z, 0, 0.01);
78  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.points[3].x, 6, 0.01);
79  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.points[3].y, 4, 0.01);
80  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.points[3].z, 0, 0.01);
81 }

104 TEST (NodeTestMissionArea, testGetDistance)
105 {
106  // create service client
107  NodeHandle nh;
108  ServiceClient client = nh.serviceClient<cpswarm_msgs::GetDist>("area/get_distance");
109  ASSERT_TRUE(client.waitForExistence(Duration(5.0))); // failure, if server does not respond within 5 seconds
110  cpswarm_msgs::GetDist msg;
111 
112  // test empty point (origin)
113  msg.request.point.x = 0;
114  msg.request.point.y = 0;
115  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
116  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_point.x, -6, 0.01);
117  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_point.y, 2.5, 0.01);
118  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_point.z, 0, 0.01);
119  ASSERT_EQ(msg.response.closest_line.size(), 2);
120  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[0].x, -6, 0.01);
121  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[0].y, 6, 0.01);
122  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[0].z, 0, 0.01);
123  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[1].x, -6, 0.01);
124  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[1].y, -6, 0.01);
125  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[1].z, 0, 0.01);
126  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.distance, 2.5, 0.01);
127 
128  // test point on area boundary edge
129  msg.request.point.x = 6;
130  msg.request.point.y = -1;
131  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
132  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_point.x, 6, 0.01);
133  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_point.y, -1, 0.01);
134  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_point.z, 0, 0.01);
135  ASSERT_EQ(msg.response.closest_line.size(), 2);
136  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[0].x, 6, 0.01);
137  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[0].y, -4, 0.01);
138  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[0].z, 0, 0.01);
139  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[1].x, 6, 0.01);
140  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[1].y, 4, 0.01);
141  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[1].z, 0, 0.01);
142  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.distance, 0, 0.01);
143 
144  // test point on area boundary vertex
145  msg.request.point.x = 6;
146  msg.request.point.y = 4;
147  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
148  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_point.x, 6, 0.01);
149  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_point.y, 4, 0.01);
150  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_point.z, 0, 0.01);
151  ASSERT_EQ(msg.response.closest_line.size(), 2);
152  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[0].x, 6, 0.01);
153  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[0].y, -4, 0.01);
154  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[0].z, 0, 0.01);
155  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[1].x, 6, 0.01);
156  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[1].y, 4, 0.01);
157  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[1].z, 0, 0.01);
158  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.distance, 0, 0.01);
159 
160  // test point outside of area boundary (closest point on boundary edge)
161  msg.request.point.x = 12;
162  msg.request.point.y = -2;
163  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
164  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_point.x, 6, 0.01);
165  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_point.y, -2, 0.01);
166  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_point.z, 0, 0.01);
167  ASSERT_EQ(msg.response.closest_line.size(), 2);
168  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[0].x, 6, 0.01);
169  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[0].y, -4, 0.01);
170  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[0].z, 0, 0.01);
171  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[1].x, 6, 0.01);
172  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[1].y, 4, 0.01);
173  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[1].z, 0, 0.01);
174  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.distance, 6, 0.01);
175 
176  // test point outside of area boundary (closest point on boundary vertex)
177  msg.request.point.x = 12;
178  msg.request.point.y = 8;
179  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
180  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_point.x, 6, 0.01);
181  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_point.y, 4, 0.01);
182  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_point.z, 0, 0.01);
183  ASSERT_EQ(msg.response.closest_line.size(), 2);
184  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[0].x, 6, 0.01);
185  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[0].y, -4, 0.01);
186  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[0].z, 0, 0.01);
187  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[1].x, 6, 0.01);

189  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.closest_line[1].z, 0, 0.01);
190  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.distance, 7.21, 0.01);
191 }

196 TEST (NodeTestMissionArea, testGetMap)
197 {
198  // create service client
199  NodeHandle nh;
200  ServiceClient client = nh.serviceClient<cpswarm_msgs::GetMap>("area/get_map");
201  ASSERT_TRUE(client.waitForExistence(Duration(5.0))); // failure, if server does not respond within 5 seconds
202  cpswarm_msgs::GetMap msg;
203 
204  // test resolution higher than parameter server
205  msg.request.rotate = false;
206  msg.request.translate = false;
207  msg.request.resolution = 0.25;
208  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
209  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.resolution, 0.25, 0.01);
210  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.width, 48, 0.01);
211  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.height, 48, 0.01);
212  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.origin.position.x, -6, 0.01);
213  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.origin.position.y, -6, 0.01);
214  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.origin.position.z, 0, 0.01);
215  ASSERT_EQ(msg.response.map.data.size(), 2304);
216  // count number of unexpected cells
217  int err = 0;
218  for (int i=0; i<48; ++i) {
219  for (int j=0; j<48; ++j) {
220  if (i < 24) {
221  if ((j+0.5) < 6.0 * (i+0.5)) {
222  if (msg.response.map.data[i*48 + j] != 0)
223  ++err;
224  }
225  else {
226  if (msg.response.map.data[i*48 + j] != 100)
227  ++err;
228  }
229  }
230  else {
231  if ((j+0.5) <= 6 * (48-(i+0.5))) {
232  if (msg.response.map.data[i*48 + j] != 0)
233  ++err;
234  }
235  else {
236  if (msg.response.map.data[i*48 + j] != 100)
237  ++err;
238  }
239  }
240  }
241  }
242  EXPECT_LE(err, 2/msg.response.map.info.resolution); // maximum number of unexpected cells
243  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.rotation, 0, 0.01);
244  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.translation.x, 0, 0.01);
245  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.translation.y, 0, 0.01);
246  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.translation.z, 0, 0.01);
247 
248  // test resolution lower than parameter server map
249  msg.request.rotate = false;
250  msg.request.translate = false;
251  msg.request.resolution = 2.5;
252  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
253  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.resolution, 2.5, 0.01);
254  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.width, 5, 0.01);
255  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.height, 5, 0.01);
256  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.origin.position.x, -6, 0.01);
257  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.origin.position.y, -6, 0.01);
258  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.origin.position.z, 0, 0.01);
259  ASSERT_EQ(msg.response.map.data.size(), 25);
260  for (int i=0; i<5; ++i) {
261  for (int j=0; j<5; ++j) {
262  if (i == 0 && j >2 || i == 4 && j > 1)
263  EXPECT_EQ(msg.response.map.data[i*5 + j], 100);
264  else
265  EXPECT_EQ(msg.response.map.data[i*5 + j], 0);
266  }
267  }
268  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.rotation, 0, 0.01);
269  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.translation.x, 0, 0.01);
270  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.translation.y, 0, 0.01);
271  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.translation.z, 0, 0.01);
272 
273  // test rotation
274  msg.request.rotate = true;
275  msg.request.translate = false;
276  msg.request.resolution = 0.25;
277  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
278  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.resolution, 0.25, 0.01);
279  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.width, 54, 0.01);
280  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.height, 48, 0.01);
281  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.origin.position.x, -6.90, 0.01);
282  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.origin.position.y, -4.93, 0.01);
283  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.origin.position.z, 0, 0.01);
284  EXPECT_EQ(msg.response.map.data.size(), 2592);
285  // dimensions of rotated quadrilateral
286  double hl = 12.0 / double(msg.request.resolution);
287  double hr = 8.0 / double(msg.request.resolution);
288  double bot = hl / cos(1.0/6.0);
289  double right = hr * cos(1.0/6.0);
290  double left = hl * cos(1.0/6.0) + hl * sin(1.0/6.0) * tan(2.0/6.0) - 0.42543043852201026225; // 26225 < 263 correction factor found by trial and error
291  // count number of unexpected cells
292  err = 0;
293  for (int i=0; i<48; ++i) {
294  for (int j=0; j<54; ++j) {
295  if ((i+0.5) < right) {
296  if ((i+0.5) / 6.0 <= j+0.5 && j+0.5 <= bot + (i+0.5) / 6.0) {
297  if (msg.response.map.data[i*54 + j] != 0)
298  ++err;
299  }
300  else {
301  if (msg.response.map.data[i*54 + j] != 100)
302  ++err;
303  }
304  }
305  else {
306  if ((i+0.5) / 6.0 <= j+0.5 && j+0.5 <= 3.0 * (left - (i+0.5))) {
307  if (msg.response.map.data[i*54 + j] != 0)
308  ++err;
309  }
310  else {
311  if (msg.response.map.data[i*54 + j] != 100)
312  ++err;
313  }
314  }
315  }
316  }
317  EXPECT_LE(err, 2/msg.response.map.info.resolution); // maximum number of unexpected cells
318  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.rotation, -0.165, 0.01);
319  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.translation.x, 0, 0.01);
320  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.translation.y, 0, 0.01);
321  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.translation.z, 0, 0.01);
322 
323  // test rotation and translation
324  msg.request.rotate = true;
325  msg.request.translate = true;
326  msg.request.resolution = 0.25;
327  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
328  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.resolution, 0.25, 0.01);
329  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.width, 54, 0.01);
330  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.height, 48, 0.01);
331  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.origin.position.x, -7, 0.01);
332  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.origin.position.y, -5, 0.01);
333  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.map.info.origin.position.z, 0, 0.01);
334  EXPECT_EQ(msg.response.map.data.size(), 2592);
335  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.rotation, -0.165, 0.01);
336  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.translation.x, -0.1, 0.01);
337  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.translation.y, -0.07, 0.01);
338  EXPECT_NEAR(msg.response.translation.z, 0, 0.01);
339 }

362 TEST (NodeTestMissionArea, testOutOfBounds)
363 {
364  // create service client
365  NodeHandle nh;
366  ServiceClient client = nh.serviceClient<cpswarm_msgs::OutOfBounds>("area/out_of_bounds");
367  ASSERT_TRUE(client.waitForExistence(Duration(5.0))); // failure, if server does not respond within 5 seconds
368  cpswarm_msgs::OutOfBounds msg;
369 
370  // test points inside
371  msg.request.pose.position.x = 0;
372  msg.request.pose.position.y = 0;
373  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
374  EXPECT_FALSE(msg.response.out);
375  msg.request.pose.position.x = 5;
376  msg.request.pose.position.y = 3;
377  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
378  EXPECT_FALSE(msg.response.out);
379  msg.request.pose.position.x = -4.57;
380  msg.request.pose.position.y = -4.1;
381  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
382  EXPECT_FALSE(msg.response.out);
383 
384  // test points on boundary edges
385  msg.request.pose.position.x = 6;
386  msg.request.pose.position.y = 3;
387  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
388  EXPECT_FALSE(msg.response.out);
389  msg.request.pose.position.x = 0;
390  msg.request.pose.position.y = 5;
391  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
392  EXPECT_FALSE(msg.response.out);
393  msg.request.pose.position.x = 0;
394  msg.request.pose.position.y = -5;
395  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
396  EXPECT_FALSE(msg.response.out);
397  msg.request.pose.position.x = -6;
398  msg.request.pose.position.y = -4.1;
399  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
400  EXPECT_FALSE(msg.response.out);
401 
402  // test points on boundary vertices
403  msg.request.pose.position.x = -6;
404  msg.request.pose.position.y = -6;
405  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
406  EXPECT_FALSE(msg.response.out);
407  msg.request.pose.position.x = 6;
408  msg.request.pose.position.y = -4;
409  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
410  EXPECT_FALSE(msg.response.out);
411  msg.request.pose.position.x = 6;
412  msg.request.pose.position.y = 4;
413  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
414  EXPECT_FALSE(msg.response.out);
415  msg.request.pose.position.x = -6;
416  msg.request.pose.position.y = 6;
417  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
418  EXPECT_FALSE(msg.response.out);
419 
420  // test points outside
421  msg.request.pose.position.x = 6.1;
422  msg.request.pose.position.y = 3;
423  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
424  EXPECT_TRUE(msg.response.out);
425  msg.request.pose.position.x = -7;
426  msg.request.pose.position.y = 5;
427  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
428  EXPECT_TRUE(msg.response.out);
429  msg.request.pose.position.x = -7;
430  msg.request.pose.position.y = -8;
431  ASSERT_TRUE(client.call(msg));
432  EXPECT_TRUE(msg.response.out);
433 }
